reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Accelerated Access to Inclusive Green Economy

description.narrative: A relatively new Namibian organization that has two places of operation. The main focus of the organization is to empower unemployed and vulnerable youth with technical skills that are relevant in the vocational sector of Namibia. This particular project a ims at enhancing access to green inclusive economy by creating a workforce in the sector. Furthermore the project aims at increasing awareness and opportunities to realize green building in Namibia. The more specific objectives are to provide practical ski lls training in green building technologies to 100 unskilled and un(der)employed young people annually in combination with Life Skills and Entrepreneurship training which will make them independent economically productive self-reliant responsible and digni fied members of society to build the capacity of local SME?s to run a viable business in green building technologies and to function as a demonstration and marketing centre on green building technologies.
